rules_text:
Lands and creatures you control have “{T}: Add one mana of any color.”
If Khiare would leave the battlefield, shuffle it into its owner's library instead.
{T}, Pay 4 life or sacrifice a permanent: Pursue Wonder. [i](Reveal a basic land or Wonder card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]The center of the Wonderlands cradles her.[/i]
